data.sql:
select title,pid,uid,uid as iid,
dbo.uf_category_treetitle('unit',pid) as p_title, dbo.uf_category_treetitle('unit',uid) as unit_title, (select count(*) from app_wy_unit b where b.pid = app_wy_unit.uid) as child, isnull((select pid from app_wy_unit c where c.uid = app_wy_unit.pid),0) as parentid from app_wy_unit where 1=1 and (#_where_#) order by len(dbo.[uf_category_treetitle]('unit',uid)), dbo.[uf_category_treetitle]('unit',uid)
